title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain public employees a deduction for distributions from governmental plans for health and long-term care insurance, and for other purposes.
content: Healthcare Enhancement for Local Public Servants Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend eligibility for tax-free distributions from governmental employee benefit plans for health and long-term care insurance to any retired state or local public employee. (2) provide for a tax deduction of such distributions rather than an exclusion from gross income, (3) allow nonitemizing taxpayers to claim such tax deduction. And (4) allow an annual inflation adjustment to the $3,000 distribution limit beginning after 2009.
